page.title: 10Girl Guides
page.content: Ringwood has two {Guide Companies;} 1st Ringwood run by Flo Humphries on a Friday and 2nd Ringwood run by Rosie Finney on a Monday. {1st Ringwood Guides:}my name is Georgina and I belong to the{Thrush {Patrol.}There are five members. During meetings we learn to cook on fires, tie knots and how to pitch a tent. There are many badges Guides can work for like Firefighter, Home Maker, Service Flash, Stitchery and Camp Permit. My friend Gail is in the{ {Nightingale Patrol.}Being a Guide means that I can go out on activities, make new friends and learn different crafts. We go to camp once a year. {2nd Ringwood Guides:}my name is Nicola. At present I am working for my Heritage badge. Our{uniform}is a blue blouse and skirt, a dark blue tie, a blue hat and black,blue or grey shoes.
